event.name: Rainy Season Green Initiative 2024
event.description: Tree planting program organized in various educational institutions of Kushtia during the rainy season to promote environmental conservation and beautification.
event.participants: All members of Save Tree Foundation Kushtia
event.outcome: Plantation of beautifying trees to contribute to environmental change in the country
event.call_to_action: Let's all work together for the country's environment

event.name: Green Kushtia: Monsoon Tree Plantation Drive
event.location: Kushtia Kolokakoli School and various educational institutions in Kushtia district
event.purpose: Tree plantation program during rainy season to beautify the environment
event.description: Members of Save Tree Foundation Kushtia enthusiastically planted decorative trees as part of an ongoing environmental initiative across educational institutions. The event aimed to inspire collective action for the country's ecological improvement.
event.message: Let's all work together for the country's environment - this is how our country will change one day!

event.name: Green Kushtia: Tree Plantation Awareness Drive

organizers: All members of Save Tree Foundation Kushtia
participants.attendees: General students of Lahini Secondary School

event.purpose: To encourage students to plant trees and work together for the country's environment
event.message: We can make our country beautiful. And this is how one day our country will change, so let's all work together for the country's environment.

event.name: Monsoon Green Drive: Kushtia Tree Planting Initiative
event.location: Road adjacent to Kushtia DC Court, Kushtia district
event.purpose: Tree planting program during monsoon season to beautify the area and improve the environment
event.description: All members of Save Tree Foundation Kushtia participated in planting beautifying trees as part of an initiative to transform the country's environment through collective effort.
